Articles.Content:
Just wanted to say hi, as I\'m new to the forum. I\'ve been following KSP since 8.2 and I\'ve been loving every minute of it. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

With the release and my subsequent buying of ver 14, I figured now\'s the time i might as well join the forums. I hope to have a wonderful time here with you all! Cheers!

Welcome to the forums!

Happy Launching!

*Arrr*!

Cap\'n Cardgame 

(and nevermind the impostors)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

(You\'re playing with fire there cardgame.)

Be sure you add fire decals to the rockets, they go **>9000%** faster if you do so!

**Waffles and Fires!**

**Arcane-**
Welcome to the forums, Happy launches! ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
